channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Four symptoms of dementia that can appear with the clocks changing this weekend
item.description: An expert warned that the clocks changing can be disorientating and even distressing for people living with dementia

item.title: Today's horoscope for March 29 as Sagittarius lets go of tension
item.description: Today's horoscope for March 29 will see Cancer face any difficulties with courage, while Aries should take their time before getting started on a new ...

item.title: Doctor urges people to start eating seven foods for a longer, healthier life
item.description: Adding some garnishes to your dinner could add years to your life

item.title: UK weather: Snow forecast as TWO storms bringing 8 inches will hit 70 counties
item.description: Two monster snow storms look set to impact as many as 70 counties across the UK, with advanced weather modelling maps showing as much as eight inches ...

item.title: Aldi's £10 'grown-up treat' is made for chocolate and cocktail lovers
item.description: The supermarket has introduced an adult-only Easter egg that has a boozy treat inside

item.title: Judge Shames Royal Air Force Engineers Who Stole Paddington Bear Statue
item.description: The judge chastised the two British service members for being the “antithesis” of everything Paddington’s character stands for.

item.title: Student so scared of DIY he paid tradesman £180 to change batteries
item.description: Sam Daley also says he doesn’t want to speak to anyone on the phone and he lacks the confidence to negotiate so sourced the tradesman through an app.

item.title: Nine English words you probably didn’t know came from Irish
item.description: Some common words we use every day, including the name of one of the UK's main political parties, have a surprising origin in Irish.

item.title: ‘New Nostradamus’ made eerie prediction about an oil tanker explosion days before it happened
item.description: 'I saw a ship or something in trouble.'

item.title: Man claims he was shot by his dog while lying in bed
item.description: The Memphis man was 'relaxing/talking' in bed when the incident occurred

item.title: Who is Mark Carney? New Canadian PM’s family, career, and more
item.description: Mark Carney met his English wife Diana when they were both members of the Oxford University Ice Hockey Club.
